mapper.insert: insert into purchase(oid, uid, uname, phone, address1, address2, sum) values(#{oid}, #{uid}, #{uname}, #{phone}, #{address1}, #{address2}, #{sum})
insert into orders(oid, pid, lprice, qnt) values(#{oid}, #{pid}, #{lprice}, #{qnt})
mapper.select: select *, format(sum, 0) as fmtsum, date_format(regdate, '%Y-%m-%d %T') as fmtdate from purchase where uid=#{uid} order by regdate desc limit #{start}, #{size};
select count(*) from purchase where uid=#{uid}
